conversations.last_message: Vous: Bro, don't even get me started on the type of girl I’m into. She’s gotta be a 10/10. 😂

messages.text: Bro, don't even get me started on the type of girl I’m into. She’s gotta be a 10/10. 😂
Lmao, you’re so picky! What’s the deal? What’s a 10/10 in Tony world?
She’s gotta have the looks, obviously. But she also needs to be funny, chill, and be able to handle my jokes. 😎
Ayyy, so basically you want a girl who can roast you back? 😂 I see you, Tony.
¿Dónde estás?
En abajo.
Franchement, j'aimerais trop le sac Furla, mais mon budget c'est plutôt un sac H&M... 😅
Ouais, je vois le genre. Mais t'inquiète, les sac H&M font leur job, c'est juste moins classe. 😂
Bah voyons...
I'll be back later
